headline: Autodesk CTO Raji Arasu calls for diversity in the teams building AI
summary: To give AI-focused women academics and others their well-deserved — and overdue — time in the spotlight, TechCrunch has been publishing a series of interviews focusing on remarkable women who’ve contributed to the AI revolution. Raji Arasu, the CTO of Autodesk, said that she's been using AI for "multiple decades" to solve software-related challenges.
